xwikidoc.name: SecureJiraConfigSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.aroger
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.aroger
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set ($redirect = $xwiki.relativeRequestURL) #set ($saveaction = 'save') #set($mydoc = $xwiki.getDocument('Macros.SecureJiraConfig')) {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} |=$msg.get('securejira.user') |=$msg.get('securejira.password') |=URL |=$msg.get('securejira.del') #foreach($objme in $mydoc.getObjects('Macros.SecureJiraConfigClass')) #set($delete_url = $mydoc.getURL('objectremove', "form_token=$!{services.csrf.getToken()}&classname=${escapetool.url('Macros.SecureJiraConfigClass')}&classid=${objme.number}&xredirect=${escapetool.url($redirect)}")) |=$objme.display('username', 'edit') |=$objme.display('password', 'edit') |=$objme.display('url', 'edit') |=[[image:icon:cross>>path:$delete_url]] #end {{html clean="false"}}

$msg.get('securejira.newfield')
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
